definition: to string together/to skewer/to connect wrongly/to gang up/to rove/string/bunch/skewer/classifier for things that are strung together, or in a bunch, or in a row: string of, bunch of, series of/to make a swift or abrupt linear movement (like a bead on an abacus)/to move across
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: The next page will explain the three types of crosstalk.
sentences.chinese: 下一單元將解釋三種類型的串音。

sentences.english: The symmetry of electrode is crucial for the extinction ration.
sentences.chinese: 電極位置的對稱性對器件串音度起決定性的影響。

sentences.english: The performance of crosstalk canceller is very important in a virtual surround sound system.
sentences.chinese: 串音消除器的性能在虛擬環繞聲系統中十分重要。

sentences.english: The offtrack and crosstalk properties of perpendicular recording with a single pole head are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了垂直記錄單極型磁頭的偏道特性及串音特性。

sentences.english: Then, we consider another problem, the robustness of the crosstalk canceller .
sentences.chinese: 接下來我們將探討另一個問題，串音消除器的強健性。

sentences.english: Cable testing instruments measure crosstalk by applying a test signal to one wire pair.
sentences.chinese: 纜線測試儀器以加上測試訊號到一對線來測量串音。

sentences.english: Also, there is also the possibility of crosstalk interference.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還有一種可能性，串音干擾。

sentences.english: This page will explain how cables are tested for crosstalk and attenuation.
sentences.chinese: 本單元將解釋如何測試電纜的串音和衰減。

sentences.english: An overheard cell-phone conversation in a public place.
sentences.chinese: 公共場所電話聊天的串音。

sentences.english: However, the most critical problem is the crosstalk disturbance.
sentences.chinese: 然而，主要的問題是串音的干擾。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
